title: SeeThroughNY :: NYC Police Pension Fund
text: Data Notes DATA NOTES: NYC Police Pension Fund The New York City Police Pension Fund data, as provided by the New York City Police Pension Fund (NYCPPF), includes actual benefit rates (the actual amount they received during the year), retirement dates, and last known employers for every individual who collected benefits. NYCPPF Pension data reflects information that is current as of June 30 for the years 2009 through 2024. *NYCPPF withheld the names of its members when they provided the data.
